Name: licensor
Description: The organization that is licensing the dataset under the license specified in the Collection's license field

Name: producer
Description: The producer of the data is the provider that initially captured and processed the source data

Name: processor
Description: A processor is any provider who processed data to a derived product

Name: host
Description: The host is the actual provider offering the data on their storage. There should be no more than one host
column3: specified as last element of the list
